title: Wall Street grapples with the return of inflation
text:
Wall Street grapples with the return of inflation Wednesday, February 14, 2018 - 01:59 
U.S. financial markets have been on edge over something neither the economy nor investors have had to contend with for the better part of a decade: concerns they may soon have to reckon with rising inflation. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. financial markets have been on edge over something neither the economy nor investors have had to contend with for the better part of a decade: concerns they may soon have to reckon with rising inflation.
